sourcesContent:
<template>

      <v-slide-group
        v-model="model"
        class="pa-4"
        active-class="success"
        show-arrows="true"

      >
        <v-slide-item
        v-for="(product, i) in products"
        :key="i"
        >
          <ProductContainer productImg="product.img" productName="product.title" shortDescription="Hello" price="product.price"/>
          

         
        </v-slide-item>
      </v-slide-group>
  </template>
  <script>
import ProductContainer from './ProductContainer.vue';

  export default {
    components: {
      ProductContainer
    },
    data: () => ({
        model: null,
        products: [
            { img: "01.png", title: "Cabbage", subtitle: "1kg", price: "$13" },
            { img: "02.png", title: "Perry's Ice Cream", subtitle: "1kg", price: "$23" },
            { img: "3.png", title: "Potato", subtitle: "1kg", price: "$17" },
            { img: "4.png", title: "Bundle Pack", subtitle: "Potato, Papaya, Oil, Cabbage", price: "$40" },
            { img: "5.png", title: "Oreo Biscuit", subtitle: "270GM", price: "$20" },
            { img: "6.png", title: "Papaya", subtitle: "1kg", price: "$10" },
        ],
    }),
    components: { ProductContainer }
}
</script>
<style>
.lowOpacity{
  opacity: 0.5;
  
}
.descriptionShort{
  display: flex;
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
</style>
